review: On paper the Chromecast gets your hopes up, but in practice It's a pain to use.. Even with my decent connection, Chromecast feels like taking a step back a decade to dropped frames, low-bandwidth video. I have used it to watch a few shows that were only available on the web, but my friends ruined the experience by ragging on the bad video. I wish I had got the Roku Streaming Stick instead.

review: I like the Chromecast thing-a-ma-jig. It works o.k. I'm finding I don't use it too much. While watching a movie (I use non premium sources), I lose the picture and then have to restart my tablet and the appropriate app. My wife finds this irritating and doesn't want to watch movies this way - a few pictures of our granddaughter is o.k.
